rows.label: tev900391_MSG0010
rows.name: Oh, hey buddy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0020
rows.name:
Sorry to spring it on ya, but...
Are you into cars at all?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_JNK0030
rows.name: Show Interest

rows.label: tev900391_SEL0040
rows.name: Say that you are a little curious.

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0050
rows.name:
Hah, I knew it! I can spot a fellow
gearhead from a mile away![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_JNK0060
rows.name: Answer Truthfully

rows.label: tev900391_SEL0070
rows.name:
Admit you don't really know
much about them.

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0080
rows.name:
Hm, really...? Oh well.
I guess there's no accounting for taste.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_JNK0090
rows.name: Brag

rows.label: tev900391_SEL0100
rows.name: Claim to have had a steam-powered car.

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0110
rows.name:
Hot damn, steam-powered? You know,
they say that was the first mechanized
vehicle in the history of humanity...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0120
rows.name:
...No, wait—why would you have had
an antique that belonged in a museum...?
You can't have been that rich![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0130
rows.name:
Anyhow, reason I ask is, I love cars.
Can't hide it—always have, always will.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0140
rows.name:
Don't get me wrong, I like speeding along
in a souped-up race car as much as any
guy, but my heart belongs to the classics.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0150
rows.name:
Ever since we shifted over to EVs, people
have been looking at classic automobiles
like they're fossils, and gas is pricey too...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0160
rows.name:
But I'll never forget the road trips I took in
my favorite ride, cruising up and down the
Pacific coast...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0170
rows.name:
...Obviously, the ride in question is gone
now, along with the rest of the Earth...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0180
rows.name:
There's cars in NLA too, but I hear they
restrict the number of licenses to limit
traffic... Don't that just beat all?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_JNK0190
rows.name: Suggest an Alternative

rows.label: tev900391_SEL0200
rows.name:
Propose taking a road trip
in a vehicular Skell.

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0210
rows.name:
You mean, drive a Skell around like
it's a car...? Hmm, not a bad idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0220
rows.name:
I suppose in a sense it IS a car.
...An armored, amphibious, hover-car.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0230
rows.name:
I have been thinking I'd like to see more
of this crazy planet, since I haven't been
here for very long yet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0240
rows.name:
All right, it's settled. Let's go drink to the
conception of the first Trans-Miran Coast-
to-Coast Pan-Continental Rally Tour![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0250
rows.name:
And you came up with it, so you'd better
believe you're taking it with me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_JNK0260
rows.name: Console

rows.label: tev900391_SEL0270
rows.name: Say he'll be able to recreate it one day.

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0280
rows.name:
Recreate it, huh...?
Hm, for sure, data banks in the Lifehold
might have info on old vehicles, too...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0290
rows.name:
Although...even if I did manage to build it,
it'd be a new machine in an old-looking
shell, not the real thing...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0300
rows.name:
The real magic of a classic car is in
feeling the history that it lived through.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0310
rows.name:
It's like an old pair of leather boots,
worn and distressed into a sublime
softness... You follow?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0320
rows.name:
Heh. I wonder if you do get it...
Still, I know you were trying to
cheer me up, so thanks for that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0330
rows.name:
Hey, if you're okay with it, you mind
if we talk about cars some more?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0340
rows.name:
I think you could get into it,
if you just got the chance to.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900391_MSG0350
rows.name:
After all, the best thing about having
a hobby is being able to share it with
others.[ST:wait ]
